lead_paragraph: Five current or former officials from an Ohio school district are appealing a ruling allowing three school shooting victims' families to proceed with parts of a lawsuit.

headline.main: Workers Appeal Ruling in Ohio School Shooting Suit
headline.print_headline: Workers Appeal Ruling in Ohio School Shooting Suit
